title: Sleek Solo Baru Stay with Onsite Spa, Infinity Pool, Two Restaurants & Rooftop Bar
description:
This luxurious retreat is nestled in the heart of Solo Baru, a region celebrated for its royal heritage and thriving batik tradition. Discover the charm of vibrant traditional markets, the historic Keraton Kasunanan Palace or the captivating Radya Pustaka Museum, all conveniently nearby.

Indulge in authentic Javanese cuisine at the hotel's restaurants, take in panoramic city views from the Sky Lounge or unwind in the infinity pool after a day of exploration. For added relaxation and rejuvenation, the hotel features a wellness spa and a fully equipped fitness centre, perfect for keeping up with your routine.
offer_address: Jalan IR Soekarno, Solo Baru, Sukoharjo, Central Java 57552, Indonesia
